tool_description: Retrieves current portfolio holdings, account balances, and historical performance data from investment accounts for analysis and rebalancing purposes.

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the investment account

start_date.description: Start date for historical data retrieval

end_date.description: End date for historical data retrieval

error_messages: Invalid account ID: The provided account identifier does not exist or access is denied. Verify account credentials and permissions.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format dates.
Data unavailable: Historical data not available for the requested time period. Try a more recent date range.
Connection timeout: Unable to connect to data provider. Check network connectivity and try again.
usage: Provide account_id and date range (start_date, end_date) to retrieve portfolio data. Set include_pending to true if you want to see pending transactions in the results.

account_value.description: Total current market value of the portfolio

cash_balance.description: Available cash balance in the account

holdings.description: List of asset symbols currently held in portfolio

quantities.description: Number of shares/units for each holding

market_values.description: Current market value for each holding
